articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Populist conservative Laura Fernández wins Costa Rica's presidential election - NPR
articles.description: Candidate Laura Fernández won a resounding victory, promising to continue the aggressive reorienting of the Central American nation's politics started by her predecessor.
articles.content: SAN JOSE, Costa Rica Conservative populist Laura Fernández won Costa Rica's presidency, promising to continue the aggressive reorienting of the Central American nation's politics started by her polit… [+3141 chars]

articles.title: Cardiologist Dr. Steven Kelley shares tips on maintaining a healthy heart - WBRZ
articles.description: BATON ROUGE — In celebration of American Heart Health Month, Cardiologist Dr. Steven Kelley from Baton Rouge Cardiology Center joined WBRZ to share tips on maintaining a healthy heart.
